bug.author: seanpmorgan
bug.description: Per <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/addons/pull/796>#796</denchmark-link> we would like to resolve why this test is flaky and remove the need for this. Example log: <denchmark-link:https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/d1ca38c5-6236-49f1-bdf7-8e1874e6f9ca/targets/tensorflow_addons%2Fubuntu%2Fgpu%2Fpy2%2Fpresubmit/log>https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/d1ca38c5-6236-49f1-bdf7-8e1874e6f9ca/targets/tensorflow_addons%2Fubuntu%2Fgpu%2Fpy2%2Fpresubmit/log</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Tests are no longer marked flaky. Most likely fixed by moving to fully eager testing, but it's difficult to parse from the history. Closing.
